SELECT BOARD_NUM , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE , READ_CNT , IS_PRIVATE , BOARD_PW , ATTACHED_NAME FROM BOARD
WHERE UPPER(TITLE) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{title})||'%'
WHERE UPPER(WRITER) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{writer})||'%'
ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC
